text: The Scent of Green Papaya (Vietnamese: Mùi đu đủ xanh, French: L'Odeur de la papaye verte) is a 1993 Vietnamese French family romantic drama movie directed by Tran Anh Hung and starring Trần Nữ Yên Khê, Man San Lu, Thi Loc Truong, Anh Hoa Nguyen, Hoa Hoi Vuong, Ngoc Trung Tran. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1994. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1990s family movies Category:1993 romantic drama movies Category:French family movies Category:French romance movies Category:French drama movies Category:Vietnamese movies Category:Movies directed by Tran Anh Hung Category:Movies set in Paris
title: The Scent of Green Papaya
